<p>With more than 230 stores spanning 43:
Con più di 230 negozi in 43 stati e in crescita, Luma è un produttore e rivenditore di abbigliamento attivo riconosciuto a livello nazionale. Siamo appassionati di stili di vita attivi e va ben oltre l'abbigliamento.

In Luma, il benessere è uno stile di vita. Non crediamo che l'età, il sesso o le azioni passate ti definiscano, solo la tua ambizione e il tuo desiderio di completezza ... oggi.

Ci differenziamo attraverso una combinazione di design e stili unici uniti a standard di qualità ineguagliabili e autenticità. I nostri fondatori hanno radici profonde nello yoga e nelle comunità della salute e le nostre selezioni servono sia i professionisti dilettanti che gli atleti professionisti.
<p>This website (\"website\") is operate: This website ("website") is operated by Luma Inc., which includes Luma stores, and Luma Private Sales. This privacy policy only covers information collected at this website, and does not cover any information collected offline by Luma. All Luma websites are covered by this privacy policy.
<p>Personal information provided on the: Personal information provided on the website and online credit card transactions are transmitted through a secure server. We are committed to handling your personal information with high standards of information security. We take appropriate physical, electronic, and administrative steps to maintain the security and accuracy of personally identifiable information we collect, including limiting the number of people who have physical access to our database servers, as well as employing electronic security systems and password protections that guard against unauthorized access.
<p>To help us achieve our goal of provid:
To help us achieve our goal of providing the highest quality products and services, we use information from our interactions with you and other customers, as well as from other parties. Because we respect your privacy, we have implemented procedures to ensure that your personal information is handled in a safe, secure, and responsible manner. We have posted this privacy policy in order to explain our information collection practices and the choices you have about the way information is collected and used.

As we continue to develop the Luma website and take advantage of advances in technology to improve the services we offer, this privacy policy likely will change. We therefore encourage you to refer to this policy on an ongoing basis so that you understand our current privacy policy.
